website_summaries.verdict: Premier women's exercise shoe for high performance, with a price tag to match.
pros: Comfortable thanks to a breathable air mesh
cons: Might cause problems for long distance running
The shoes are expensive, so it requires extra thought before making a purchase

customer_reviews.title: The best crossfit trainig shoe so far
customer_reviews.text: They are incredibly comfortable, light and yet solid. They have a wide base for balance and a thicker sole for jumps and running.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Bronfman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. First time wearing them, walked 30 mins to the gym to "break them in" had a squat session and it was a pleasant surprise. These shoes are so comfortable and flat, perfect for lifting... This coming from someone that uses vibrams fivefingers and walks barefoot whenever possible... This shoe, for me, offer that flat feeling with the added cushion. I like the barefoot feeling, which this doesn't have but I really like them!! I always use 6 on athletic shoes so went ahead and ordered my size and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes; they are perfect for Crossfit, including WODs with some running. I even do some light running (up to 3 miles) in them as well. The survey asks how long I can wear them comfortably, but I use them for Crossfit, not wearing around all day like I would normal shoes. The survey also asks if they provide good arch support- well that's not what they are for anyways; so the fact that I answered "no", should not be a negative. If you are looking for a shoe with arch support, then these types of shoes are probably not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lawson

customer_reviews.title: ... just received these shoes and so far they are great. I have neuromas in both feet and they ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received these shoes and so far they are great. I have neuromas in both feet and they were recommended to me by my son, who is a crossfit coach. The toe box has plenty of room and I ordered my regular size. It is nice to have a shoe that is the right size and has room enough to not pinch but to support and not have my foot moving around or my heel coming out of the shoe when I do lunges. I can't wait to wear them on a hike and see how they work out in that kind of activity.
customer_reviews.author: Utimio D. Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these Nanos. I just finished Filthy 50 and I felt like I was walking on air. The support is incredible and they really help soften the impact you feel with box jumps. Highly recommend for Crossfit. They run about a half size too small, but ultimately you'd probably be okay with your regular size if you like a tight fit, I however like some breathing room. Also, I saw someone complain about the width in the toe box, but I watched a review on YouTube and that was done purposefully for squatting purposes etc. I suggest looking into their reasoning before returning them.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Make a difference when I lift
customer_reviews.text: I said the arch support wasn't "good" but it could just be my feet. I stuck a pair of insoles in them and they're fine. I did order an 8 instead of my street size 7.5 as recommended by other reviewers. That said, these shoes made a noticeable difference when I lift (I'm a newbie to cross fit). I was wearing my running shoes and was rolling up on my toes a lot. I don't think you can beat them for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie J.

customer_reviews.title: ... really put a pounding on my shoes and I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm an advanced workout person and really put a pounding on my shoes and I love these shoes. They look really nice even though, I only wear them when I'm working out at home. I would get another pair, if I couldn't find anything that was reasonably priced and also a minimalist shoe. I switched from the usual tennis shoe with high arches to minimal shoes and they are working for me.
customer_reviews.author: WendyJ

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe...but roomy in toe
customer_reviews.text: While I really like these shoes, I find that the toe area is quite roomy...almost too roomy for me. I've' tightened the laces as much as possible, but I still have quite a bit of room up there. I will probably put in insoles to compemsate. Be that as it may, the shoes are great. Very comfortable and with good support. I may try another pair to see if it's just my shoes or true to all the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H

customer_reviews.title: Good Product Just Want more Arch Support
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size larger because that is what the other reviewers said to do. They fit me well and great color. They work great for crossfit type exercises. Only complaint is the arch support. I wish there was more support!
customer_reviews.author: megga megg

customer_reviews.title: Normally 9.5 needed a 10
customer_reviews.text: These are a great color, more of a purple then the picture shows. I liked the fit, but the 9.5 was too short for my foot. The 10 is a little wide, but I still like the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jill G

customer_reviews.title: These really are great shoes for crossfit
customer_reviews.text: These really are great shoes for crossfit. They are not as "barefoot" as one would want from a "nano," but I've discovered they do work well at the gym, especially for those heavy lifting days when one wants more support than the barest of the barefoot shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Bea Trice

customer_reviews.title: I love them. I do kickboxing
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Nanos that I've bought. I love them. I do kickboxing, self defense, fitness, and weightlifting classes in them. I like the way the sole is attached. I had shoes before where the sole would come apart from the shoe because of the pivoting movements I do. Not these!
customer_reviews.author: at9255

customer_reviews.title: Great CrossFit shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great CrossFit shoe. They are lightweight and very comfortable. Not to mention a good look with your workout clothes:) Only complaint would be they take some getting use too. For some reason they made my feet go numb the first couple times wearing them during a WOD. especially burpees. however I haven't had the issue since and they are a great lightweight shoe. do NOT recommend for long runs though.
customer_reviews.author: lisa1918

customer_reviews.title: My old pair were Nano 2's and I hated their pattern and coloring
customer_reviews.text: A little stiff the first few days of wearing, but I use them strictly for crossfit. My old pair were Nano 2's and I hated their pattern and coloring. The solid black with a splash of pink is a much more pleasing aestethic for me. The only negative comment I have is the toe box of the right shoe feels differently from the left, but isn't enough of a problem to worry over except for certain excercises, i.e. burpees.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Krivacka

customer_reviews.title: They are fine for all CrossFit activities
customer_reviews.text: I knew these were wide at the toe when I bought them, so the weird shape wasn't a surprise. They are ugly! But I've been using them for a year, and they are well-made shoes. I use them exclusively for CrossFit 3x a week. They are fine for all CrossFit activities.
customer_reviews.author: AmTaBo

customer_reviews.title: Ah-mazing!  Best shoe I've ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes! I have a wider foot where my foot is the widest and these shoes for perfect. They make me more comfortable and stable during my WOD's and just all over. Would HIGHLY recommend. They are a great look too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: My fourth pair
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair...different color. I wear size 9 in all other shoes; this one size 10 fits. The wide toe box fits my feet. I wish the purple color were still in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent shoes for CrossFit
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent shoes for CrossFit! Really made a huge difference in my squats since I, not pitched forward by my shoes anymore. A few other women in my box wear these as well and swear by the Nanos!
customer_reviews.author: Underwater girl

customer_reviews.title: SO COMFORTABLE!!
customer_reviews.text: SO COMFORTABLE!!!! I recommend these shoes for anything (but running) for! They are so comfortable I culd sleep in them lol. They give you what you need for crossfit, I like the fact I can feel the ground per say when I do my crossfit work outs and I am able to get grip when I do rope climbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They offer both good support and cushion
customer_reviews.text: I am never let down by Reebok Crossfit Nano's. I use them daily at the gym on weight machines and treadmill. They offer both good support and cushion. While the bright blue color was a little surprising at first, now it's fun.
customer_reviews.author: cp

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I use them with the insanity workout and noticed a greater ability within the workout due to better stability from the shoes. I would definitely recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: But I've been doing crossfit regularly for almost 3 months now and I'm SO glad I got these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I wasn't sure at first! But I've been doing crossfit regularly for almost 3 months now and I'm SO glad I got these shoes!! GREAT starter shoes for crossfit...I'm SURE I'll upgrade with the Reebok's as I get better!
customer_reviews.author: joweber77

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. These are my second pair of crossfit nano. These are however better looking and sleek. I found them really fantastic so far. The U shape is the same as 2.0, but maybe less evident, making it for a perfect shoe. I also feel like this pair provides better support for running.
customer_reviews.author: Annaelle

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 7 so it was a good thing i ordered a 71/2 because there is enough room for your toes instead of cramping them. I love working out in this shoes
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: but I didn't like the lack of arch support
customer_reviews.text: Style seems sufficient for its purpose, but I didn't like the lack of arch support, and the sizing is definitely off. I wear a 5, sometimes even a 4 1/2, and these in a 5 were too short for my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Alamito

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for both everyday and heavy walking
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these shoes. They were comfortable from the moment I put them on, and have enough of a sole that it doesn't wear through with my heavy exercise-walking the way "naked" shoes do.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: These are by far my favorite athletic shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: These are by far my favorite athletic shoes ever!!! They are very comfy and have super grip!!!! I bought the pink and also bought pink boxing gloves, they are a near perfect match. I look so stylish at the gym now.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Gym shoes !
customer_reviews.text: My wife's I love with these shoes ! They are her first pair of cf style shoes ! The toe room is great and they are very sturdy ! Must own these !
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rose

customer_reviews.title: For WODS it is worth the expense!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They made a significant difference in my WODS compared to my high end running shoes I wore. Was not sure about size, I wear 9-9 1/2 in a running shoe, 8 1/2 in a casual shoe. Being a narrow width I chose 8 1/2 and they are just right. What is so great about this training shoe is that you can feel the ground underneath you for stability, but enough cushion for protection.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: I was really disappointed. There is very little flexibility in the forefront ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for Combat training and plyometrics. I was really disappointed. There is very little flexibility in the forefront of the shoe. They feel stiff, clunky and heavy. They might be a good all around gym shoe for anything that requires stability.
customer_reviews.author: PSYuhas

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these shoes. Bought a pair for my mother in pink. They are comfortable and fantastic cross-fit shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... and been having a lot of problems finding a comfortable shoe to play in
customer_reviews.text: I have a very high arch and been having a lot of problems finding a comfortable shoe to play in. I played 6 hours straight at a family entertainment play center in these and couldn't believe my feet did not kill me. There is no break in period with these either. LOVE LOVE LOVE!! And I really Love the color scheme!! Well worth the money! Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Twin Girls

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe made a huge difference in my training. I use to struggle for sore and tired sometimes even pain full feet during crossfit training. NO MORE! Great product, great fit, al around a really good shoe for weight training.
customer_reviews.author: A Steyn

customer_reviews.title: would have liked more cushioning
customer_reviews.text: Ok shoe.... would have liked more cushioning. I do HIIT 3 times a week plus muscle and cardio classes, so I am a high frequency user. I liked my Reebok Sharks more, but Nano has better lateral stability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT love these
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to wear after ear surgery cause my balance is going to be off. GREAT love these. I will be buying more even though I don't do cross fit.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: She loved them. The colors were great and they are ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my wife at Xmas. She loved them. The colors were great and they are super comfortable. She kept bragging about them so I went out and purchased more.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Fawcett

customer_reviews.title: Love these for non-running days :)
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, just order a half size up. The shape of the front of the shoe makes the half size up necessary. I don't do crossfit, but I love these shoes when I am doing my own workouts -- push ups, jumping jacks, etc... I would NOT buy these if you need a shoe for running.
customer_reviews.author: msjaycee

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Along with being incredibly stable while working ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Along with being incredibly stable while working out in crossfit over a large variety of exercises, they are comfortable enough to wear if you are on your feet for hours. No other shoe I own is like that.
customer_reviews.author: Rebelry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them and still use them till this day
customer_reviews.author: Kristina S.

customer_reviews.title: Wide Toe Box
customer_reviews.text: Was told to go up a size so I ordered an 8. The 8 was way too big, had to return them. Don't think I will even try getting a 7.5 because I think the toe box was too wide for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Athena Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes for CrossFit
customer_reviews.text: Bought them one half-size larger than my regular work shoes to allow for my feet to expand during workout. They are extremely comfortable and lightweight and I have a better stance when lifting, yet these shoes are durable enough for the jumping, rowing, running in the CrossFit box. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Seagroves

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love! I have the Nano 2.0 also and love those too. I am excited that the 3.0 has a little more stability for running. Great for all my crossfit work outs.
customer_reviews.author: christy

customer_reviews.title: I bought these shoes to use for Crossfit. They ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to use for Crossfit. They are well made, my only problem is that there is no arch support. I tried to put Dr. Scholls arch support in them, but that makes the shoes too tight. I'm going to wear them only for workouts, but I don't think I will be able to wear them outside of the gym due to lack of support.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: The moment I put these on I completely fell in love with them. They are just what I need for my HIIT workouts, burpees are even easier somehow!
customer_reviews.author: A. Fitch

customer_reviews.title: I have extremely flat feet and a bad achilles tendon in one heel
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky about my shoes, workout shoes especially. I have extremely flat feet and a bad achilles tendon in one heel. These shoes allowed me to jog and workout the first day I put them on with no pain. I plan to buy another pair for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: mrshoppy

customer_reviews.title: Found success!
customer_reviews.text: It took me awhile to find a good pair of workout shoes that fit my foot comfortably with a low heel. So far these shoes have been great for crossfit/cross training. Good for the average to wider foot. I can wear a 6 1/2 to 7 and ordered a 7. Perfect size. The only reason I did not give them a 5 is only because I need more time training in them.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rojewski

customer_reviews.title: This shoes give more room at the toes area and no arch support which is perfect for those who have flat and wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. There are more room for my toes and of course I have flat feet and they don't hurt my feet at alll because there isn't arch support. If you have high arches this type of shoes are not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable. They do not hurt my feet when working ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are just what I was looking for. They are comfortable. They do not hurt my feet when working out which is a total plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Super comfortable. All I wear to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Kym

customer_reviews.title: Love the style and feel of these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and feel of these shoes. No issues with chafing or blistering during my first few WOD's.
customer_reviews.author: Eve L

customer_reviews.title: Provides stability & great for running.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes for CrossFit. Provides stability when doing weights. I can also run and do cardio activities in them with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Alberts

customer_reviews.title: I Love these Shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful, I received many compliments and they fit my feet perfectly. Will be purchasing this shoe again in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Muriel

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy!
customer_reviews.text: I just love my Crossfit shoes! The price couldn't be beat! They were delivered early and the quality is great! They are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product....classy and gets alot of attention from others at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: True review

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these reebok crossfit shoes. I have 3 pair now and they are very comfortable. A great workout shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: This is a great sneaker, I feel stable in the movements we ...
customer_reviews.text: I am new to crossfit and decided I needed shoes to match. This is a great sneaker, I feel stable in the movements we do at the gym, whether it's lifting, jumping or running. I'm happy with my purchase and the colors are slammin'!
customer_reviews.author: Erica D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: They look great and feel great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had to have a pair! She loves them! I have a pair, and my son has 2 pairs. They look great and feel great, too
customer_reviews.author: connie billingsley

customer_reviews.title: Love my nanos!
customer_reviews.text: They fit as expected and I love them. I wear them normally on endudance/cross training days and wear minimalist shoes for strength days.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: Great for CrossFit
customer_reviews.text: The shoes for as expected. They are a wide shoe. Very stable around top of foot. Great for box jumping and lifting routines.
customer_reviews.author: cindy beyer

customer_reviews.title: 0 in a size 9 and they fit fine. These were cut really short in the front ...
customer_reviews.text: I own a pair of nano 2.0 in a size 9 and they fit fine. These were cut really short in the front and we're not a true size 9
customer_reviews.author: Tina E

customer_reviews.title: Love love love my nanos
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my nanos! I've gotten so much use out of them, and compliments! They fit perfect and are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Yaysammayy - Samantha Randall

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Perfect for running and cross-fit
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! Perfect for running, hiking, jump-roping and cross-fit training. These shoes are very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda and Vincent Houseal

customer_reviews.title: Great for cross training/circuit classes
customer_reviews.text: I wear this for my cross training/circuit classes. Good shoe for squats, lunges, box jumps, not so much for running.
customer_reviews.author: PranaVA

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy, good lifting support
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very comfortable and give you the extra strength in your heels you need for lifting and squats. They are not the best for running.
customer_reviews.author: D. Daggett

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife and she loves them. We did not have any fitting issues like others had. We highly recommend to anyone who does crossfit and is dedicated to it.
customer_reviews.author: W. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love them!!!!! They are really cute and comfortable. However, they do run a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: So flattering to the legs and great for heavy lifts
customer_reviews.text: So flattering to the legs and great for heavy lifts. Not so great for distance running but fine for sprints and the like.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Great for flat feet!
customer_reviews.text: Really good for flat feet. Wish they were wider for flat feet.
customer_reviews.author: cucumber

customer_reviews.title: These shoes fit great, and mirror barefoot performance
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit great, and mirror barefoot performance. I got them for crossfit, but will get another pair for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony K. Mccamish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit and look great! Have really helped in my training. The flex and grip are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Eberhardt

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes for a wod! They're super comfortable and if u get them wet they will dry out very fast
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: My daughter and I both wear size 5. The ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I both wear size 5. The size 5 I purchased are a little too snuggle on my feet, but fits my daughters just right. So I'd say the width is on the narrow side.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: They are ok, but...
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes, but they do not have a lot of support. They were not made to comfortably run in. They do the job, but I might switch back to my Asics just so I can run more comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Barber

customer_reviews.title: I've been wearing Chucks as my gym shoes for the past year but sad I waited as long as I did to try ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't do crossfit but am a daily weight lifter. I've been wearing Chucks as my gym shoes for the past year but sad I waited as long as I did to try these out. The are super comfortable, light, and don't interfere with my form while performing squats or deadlifts. The color is great as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Fulmore

customer_reviews.title: the toes are shaped like a foot
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, the toes are shaped like a foot. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for cross fit... Not the best for running
customer_reviews.author: Rinda

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes! they fit perfect! THese shoes are extremely comfortable and perfect for crossfit. ! i loved the color and the feel of the shoes!!!
customer_reviews.author: bella

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe! you should get it with your eyes closed
customer_reviews.author: DILP

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I've always worn Nike, but since I've been doing Crossfit I decided to give the Nano 3.0 a try. The toe box is wide, esp compared to Nike. I know these shoes get good reviews but I have to say I like the Nano 2.0 better.they're more comfortable and don't feel so wide in the toe box. Will most likely return them.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: ... roomy in the toes for me but otherwise a great
customer_reviews.text: A little too roomy in the toes for me but otherwise a great shoe
customer_reviews.author: Zurilee

customer_reviews.title: This is my second pair and love the comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair and love the comfort. They cause no pain to my niggly foot because of the wide toe box. I recommend them for weight and strength training. Because they are flat you have better balance
customer_reviews.author: Beverley Hulse

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty wide, takes some getting used to. Great for crossfit.
customer_reviews.author: Agz

customer_reviews.title: so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My foot feels more stable now when doing squats I love them
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and perfect for cross fit
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and perfect for cross fit. My coach referred me to this shoe and they have worked great for me. I am between a 7 and 7.5 and I'm glad I got the 7.5.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Kelly

customer_reviews.title: The only thing my wife didn't like was that the shoes were too wide on the ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit as expected. So you DO have to order at least half of size of your regular one. The only thing my wife didn't like was that the shoes were too wide on the front part
customer_reviews.author: Cristian

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, well,price but a little bigger than I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Harris

customer_reviews.title: the color is fine!! roses as they sent me
customer_reviews.text: hello! They sent me shoes , but they sent me waist was 5.5 uk 25cm . and I need 4.5 uk 24cm , I get a little big , the color is fine !! roses as they sent me! is there any chance that I contraptions ? They can send and send them when I return these ? thx !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia N.

customer_reviews.title: they are good at everything
customer_reviews.text: I bought the nano 3.0 for my wife. she is very picky about her training shoes. one workout she was sold! they are good at everything. lifting,running,jumping,and climbing rope. it's because of the break in the sole across the toes for flexabilty.
customer_reviews.author: tommy

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are great for stability
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are great for stability, suck to run in but that doesn't bother me. They were a great price and I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy S

customer_reviews.title: This shoes are wonderful im doing insanity max 30 and they work perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are wonderful im doing insanity max 30 and they work perfect for a such challange workouts my knees are protected for jumping love them!!
customer_reviews.author: polly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect crossfit shoe
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe! I bought these for crossfit and they are great for WODs with a lot of lifting moves. Not as comfortable to run in but I do have a high arch. The fit is perfect and did not need to adjust my size.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle K Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love my Nanos
customer_reviews.text: Love my Nanos!! I wear them all the time not only when I am doing crossfit. They are so comfortable and really help out with completing WODS correctly. They are a very light weight shoe also. I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Gardner

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome for cross training and lifting
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome for cross training and lifting. NOT RUNNING SHOES! If you are looking for shoes to run in, look up running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: New kicks of the right kind def have improved my performance as well as I don't feel like screaming bc my heels hurting
customer_reviews.text: My feet used to hurt so much during WODs. New kicks of the right kind def have improved my performance as well as I don't feel like screaming bc my heels hurting. Love these!!!
customer_reviews.author: natalie black

customer_reviews.title: These shoes have no support and are not good for running
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have no support and are not good for running. They feel a bit wide, not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Candis Smith

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: no complaints, great product and fit well which was my concern in the event we had to return and wasn't sure if I had to eat the shipping costs, but didn't have to worry about it in the end
customer_reviews.author: eric lemire

customer_reviews.title: Love liftng in them
customer_reviews.text: When I first put them on, I was concerned they might be to small. I wore them to CF the next day and was pleased they were just right.
customer_reviews.author: Janis R

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy with how much they stabilized my feet during my ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes feel a bit small for me but my trainer told me they will stretch and not to order a bigger size. I was very happy with how much they stabilized my feet during my lifts.
customer_reviews.author: M.Gray

customer_reviews.title: The right shoe was considerably smaller in the toe area ...
customer_reviews.text: The right shoe was considerably smaller in the toe area than the left. I'm hoping they stretch just a bit.
customer_reviews.author: jrobbins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes, love the color
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes, love the color, and somehow feel that I can now do a sub 15 minute wonder woman style Murphy.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lanoue

product_meta.title: Reebok Women's Crossfit Nano 3.0 Training Shoe
product_meta.description: Reebok was founded for one of the best reasons possible: athletes wanted to run faster. So in the 1890s, Joseph William Foster made some of the first known running shoes with spikes in them. By 1895, he was in business making shoes by hand for top runners; and before long his fledgling company, J.W. Foster and Sons, developed an international clientele of distinguished athletes.
